channel.title: Hubert Davis on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: How Director Hubert Davis’ ‘The Well’ and ‘Youngblood,’ Now in Post, Put a Spin on Genre Conventions
item.description: While Hubert Davis celebrates the world premiere of his narrative feature debut the eco-thriller “The Well” on July 21 at the Fantasia Film Festival in Montreal, he is already deep into the post sound
